welcomeDescOne: Bring your ideas to life! Join Hyppe, the heartbeat of Indonesian social media.
welcomeDescTwo: Whether you're watching ads or crafting content, you can earn rewards on Hyppe!
welcomeDescThree: Be an inspiration without the drama, Hyppe is dedicated to a conflict-free and hoax-free space.
welcomeDescFour: Your space for inspiration and self-expression. Safeguard your creativity from imitation on Hyppe! #ShareWhatInspireYou

addYourBankAccountForAnEasierWithdraw: Add your bank account for an easier withdraw
messageBankNotMatched: Bank account name and your ID did not matched. Click Here to visit our Help Center
aboutBankAccountContent:
1. You can add up to 5 (five) bank account numbers. You can add, change and/or delete the bank account from your list 

2. Make sure that the name listed on the bank account is matched with the real name on your ID that you have uploaded on application. If your name does not match, the transaction process will not be able to continue. 

If you have followed the method above, but it doesn't work, you can complain about this problem to the Hyppe Help Center 081398582108
makeSureTheName: *Make sure the name of the account holder is the same as the ID card used for verification on the Hyppe App
min4second: Minimum duration of the Hyppe Diary is 4 seconds
youCanAddUpTo: you can add up to 5 account

byRegisteringYourContent: By registering your content, you hereby responsible for the authenticity of this content. All forms of legal issues related to the authenticity of the content will be resolved by both parties. This certificate is valid until it changes ownership by selling this content.
reaNameNotice: Make sure to use your full name as it appears on the E-KTP. This can not be edited in the next stage
uploadIdCardNotice1: Make sure you upload a photo of the E-KTP taken directly from your cellphone camera
uploadIdCardNotice2: Photo of the original E-KTP or in your own name
uploadIdCardNotice3: Upload a physical photo of the E-KTP, not a photocopy
uploadIdCardNotice4: The photo of the E-KTP is not damaged (e.g., cracked or broken)
uploadIdCardNotice5: E-KTP photos are clear, not blurry, and the light is bright enough and not cropped
uploadIdCardNotice6: Do not use flash when taking E-KTP photos
uploadIdCardNotice7: Make sure the selfie you take is facing forward, has sufficient lighting, no flash, and is not cropped
uploadIdCardNotice8: If you have followed the method above but it doesn't work, you can report this problem to the Hype Help Center at (813) 998-5108.
cameraTakeIdCardInfo: Make sure your E-KTP is in the frame
pleaseMakeSuretheResidenceNumberMatchest: Please make sure the residence number matches the E-KTP. If the E-KTP photo doesn't match, you can take it back or submit an appeal
placeBirthNote: Please enter your place of birth as stated on the E-KTP
selectDateBirthInfo: Please enter your date of birth as stated in E-KTP (hh-bb-tttt)
confirmIdGenuine: By continuing, I certify that the data I have filled in is accurate and genuine
confirmIdNotice: This verification process can only be done once. Make sure the data matches your ID.
supportDocNotice1: You can upload supporting documents such as a family identity card, passport, and driver’s license issued legally by the country
supportDocNotice2: Make sure your full name is listed on your family identity card
supportDocNotice3: Make sure your name and ID number on the family identity card can be read clearly and match the ID card that you uploaded earlier
supportDocNotice4: With supporting documents such as a passport, you can upload the front page of your passport, which displays your photo and full name
supportDocNotice5: Make sure your driver’s license full name matches the ID card that you uploaded earlier
supportDocNotice6: Make sure your supporting documents are original
supportDocNotice7: Upload an original supporting document, not a copy
supportDocNotice8: The photo of the supporting document is not damaged, for example, torn, cracked, blurry, broken, and/or dirty
supportDocNotice9: Do not use flash when taking the photo
supportDocNotice10: If you have followed the method above, but it doesn't work, you can complain about this problem to the Hyppe Help Center 081398582108
failedIdCardInfoTitle: We're sorry, your previous request was not able to be processed
failedIdCardInfo1: The e-KTP is blurry or damaged so that it cannot be recognized.
failedIdCardInfo3: The NIK and selfie photos do not match the E-KTP photo.
failedIdCardInfo4: Supporting documents do not match the E-KTP and selfie photos.
failedIdCardInfo5: The e-KTP has been registered in the Hyppe application
failedIdCardInfo6: Fraud or malicious attempts against the law were detected.

ticketLevel1: For critical issues like app crashes and major bugs that require immediate technical attention.
ticketLevel2: For issues affecting user experience, including login problems and delayed posting.
ticketLevel3: For issues that occasionally require technical assistance, such as unresponsive buttons.
ticketLevel4: For issues that affect user comfort, such as spelling errors, confusing flows, or layouts needing adjustment.

ifYouReviewedOurCommunityGuidelinesAndBe:
If you reviewed our community guidelines and believe your content was removed by mistake, let us know by submitting an appeal. when we complete the review, you’ll receive and update in your notification tab. 

 Your content was removed for violating our community guidelines. To appeal this decision, include a description of the issue below.
